channel.title: How Do I Get My No-Ip Server Online?
channel.description: ive made a no-ip server but i got one problem. how do i get it online? if you can help i would really appreciate it. thx[br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2006, 06:08:28 PM[/size][hr]i guess no1 here kno's how to get it online?

item.source: How Do I Get My No-Ip Server Online?

item.title: How Do I Get My No-Ip Server Online?
item.dc:creator: @kennetht kennetht
item.description:
@kennetht wrote:

Well, first of all you register to the website: http://www.no-ip.com. Which you’ve already done. Now, download the DUC program, once you’ve done that, install it, during the process you’ll have to enter your No-Ip email and password. Run it, right click the white space once the program is up and running, now click refresh host list.

Now, open your source, click on RunServer.bat, your server should now be up and running.

I appolagise taking so long to notice this topic.

Feel free to Private Message me for any more help.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Get My No-Ip Server Online?
